thread.title: Dave
thread.title_full: VIP Electronic Cigarette Ireland reviewed by Dave

author: Dave
title: Dave
text:
I've bought from VIP for over a year now and they always deliver in time as advertised. I've never been left disappointed with the quality of the product either and any emails I've sent have been quickly replied to.
Highly recommend this company to anyone looking for an alternative to cigarettes
